HEAD: IFTECH Pakistan 2026 - International Exhibition of Food & Beverage Processing Packaging Technologies
Industry:
IFTECH Pakistan serves as an avenue to showcase the growth and development of the food and hospitality industries, which are seen to contribute largely to the country's GDP. To the trade visitor this expo serves as a perfect platform for sourcing, updating on the latest innovations and brand recalls as they interact and engage with the exhibitors. After 18 years of consistent development, IFTECH has become the industry leading trade show. It is a platform for food and hospitality industry to enter the Pakistan food and beverage market. The show invites local and international importers, distributors, retailers and food service professionals to meet and connect with food manufacturers from around the world to find new business.
Held with concurrent exhibitions.
Items_exhibited: Dairy and livestock, Meat and Poultry, Fruits and Vegetables, Rice and Flour Milling, Packaging, Snacks and Confectionery, Flavors and Ingredients, Beverages, Hospitality and Bakery
